com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.ncf
Class NCFHostingTechnology

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.AbstractHostingTechnology
      com.kuka.roboticsAPI.publishing.server.ncf.NCFHostingTechnology
All Implemented Interfaces:
IContractProvider, java.lang.Runnable
public class NCFHostingTechnology
extends AbstractHostingTechnology
implements java.lang.Runnable, IContractProvider

The hosting technology for NCF services.
This class implements the server thread that is waiting for incoming connection requests. For each request, a session is created. This class also is the contract provider for all NCF service contracts.

getServiceContract

public ServiceContract getServiceContract(java.lang.String contractName)
                                   throws ContractException
Description copied from interface: IContractProvider
Request the service contract model for a given contact name.

Specified by:
getServiceContract in interface IContractProvider
Parameters:
contractName - The name of the service contract for which the model is requested
Returns:
A ServiceContract instance. If no contract with that name exists, the implementation should throw a ContractException rather than returning null.
Throws:
ContractException - A service contract cannot be provided for the given contract name.

getServiceContract

public ServiceContract getServiceContract(java.lang.String contractName,
                                          com.kuka.common.versioning.InterfaceVersion contractVersion)
Gets a published service by contract name and version.

Parameters:
contractName - The contract name of the service
contractVersion - The contract version of the service
Returns:
The service registration of the published service, if exactly one service with the given contract name exists that has a compatible version; otherwise returns null.
